website_summaries.verdict: A heavy-duty ski rope that is easy to see in the water and holds up well over time.
pros: The line is pre-stretched to help make the rope sturdier for skiers
Diamond grip helps keep the handle from being too slippery
Comes with 4 sections in order to let you adjust the length easily
Includes a rope keeper to help the rope from getting tangled or knotted in the boat
cons: At 70 feet, this rope is about 5 feet shorter than other ropes on the market

customer_reviews.title: Want to SKI?
customer_reviews.text: This is a great ski rope!! We had purchased a ski rope at a boat marina that the owners recommended and it was crap. Fell apart and frayed after one use. This rope is wonderful. Very easy to see and visible on the handle floats. The handle is one you can grip and is not slick, so your hands don't slip off. This is a sturdier and thicker rope than the one purchased at the marina and it is what we needed as we are teaching beginner skiers. Very pleased with this rope!!
customer_reviews.author: Keene Family

customer_reviews.title: This gripper is awesome! I'm a 50 yr old female and my ...
customer_reviews.text: This gripper is awesome! I'm a 50 yr old female and my family loves to say I'm getting weak, but this handle keeps me from loosing my grip. Floats great when your not moving and love the different colors at different lengths of the rope. A very well planned out piece of equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Gayla

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: I actually use this for my dog going swimming, so can't speak much on the actual use. Seems pretty doable and I like the different lengths. Floats nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kneeboarding!
customer_reviews.text: Good rope, it's thinner than others we've used, but it held well with riders up to 270 pounds. It's great that the sections are color coded, so you can pick how far from the boat you want to be for the best wake. Only used it a few times over a couple of days on the water, but hope it lasts!
customer_reviews.author: Aurora

customer_reviews.title: Good Rope But....
customer_reviews.text: It's a very good ski rope except the handle does NOT float. I thought any ski rope would have a floating handle. I'm a little disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Walt B.

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Adjustable lengths perfect for finding the best wake!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Good ski rope
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Handle floats. We have pulled knee boarders without any problems.
customer_reviews.author: william

customer_reviews.title: Good rope
customer_reviews.text: We have used it three times so far and it works well. No complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Love the Trails

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Handle is way too narrow. Should be called ski rope for under 8 years old.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ZERO STARS - Junk - Used 4 Times and Grip Broke
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product. I would like to get a refund. Used 4 times water skiiing and it tore at the handle grip.
customer_reviews.author: DLSteig

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this rope
customer_reviews.text: Worst ski rope ever handle is extremely slippery and the handle sinks in the water. Bad purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gracie girl

customer_reviews.title: Looks nothing like pictured item
customer_reviews.text: Had to return very cheap construction. Looks nothing like pictured item.
customer_reviews.author: Ken myers

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: excellent rope, very strong. Love the diamond grip handle..great product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Handle does not float
customer_reviews.text: I love the style and comfort of the grip, but had to reglue some of the foam rubber back on after a year. Two years later now I had to glue the other half back on. The different colors are cool, and helpful to adjust for different riders. One big downside for me is that the HANDLE DOES NOT FLOAT. So many times a downed rider can't locate the rope because it has sunk, only to pull it up with weeds all over it. I'm looking for a new rope right now, and will not buy this one again. It is still a decent value, but you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.author: Brian S.

product_meta.title: RAVE 4-Section Pro Ski Rope
product_meta.description: The Pro Water Ski rope is the perfect rope for skiers who have more advanced skills.
feature_bullets: The Pro Water Ski rope is the perfect rope for skiers who have more advanced skills.
15" (30cm) aluminum heavy duty raised diamond grip EVA handle
